t:parameter.name: NetworkTimeout
t:parameter.description: Timeout for blocking network calls (in seconds)

t:parameter.name: TargetIp
t:parameter.description: Target IP Address

t:parameter.name: TargetPort
t:parameter.description: Port used by the atsvc service

t:parameter.name: Username
t:parameter.description: Username entered as hex bytes (in Unicode)

t:parameter.name: Credential
t:parameter.description: Unicode password entered as hex bytes (in Unicode)

t:parameter.name: Username
t:parameter.description: Username entered as hex bytes (in Unicode)

t:parameter.name: Credential
t:parameter.description: Hash of user/machine password entered as hex bytes

t:paramgroup.name: MachineHash
t:paramgroup.description: Credentials for the domain computer, obtained from lsadump

t:parameter.name: Username
t:parameter.description: Machine's name, with trailing '$' character, in UNICODE

t:parameter.name: Password
t:parameter.description: Machine hash obtained from lsadump, entered as HEX bytes.

t:parameter.name: Username
t:parameter.description: Name of the user who owns the Kerberos ticket (in Unicode)

t:parameter.name: DomainDns
t:parameter.description: DNS name of the domain being exploited (in Unicode)

t:parameter.name: KerberosTicket
t:parameter.description: Kerberos ticket with necessary privileges

t:parameter.name: SessionKey
t:parameter.description: Encryption key used in the Kerberos ticket

t:parameter.name: TicketFile
t:parameter.description: Local file holding Kerberos ticket
